metadata.title: CVE-2023-52877 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: usb:typec: tcpm: Fix NULL pointer dereference in tcpm_pd_svdm() It is possiblethat typec_register_partner() returns ERR_PTR on failure. Whenport->partner is an error, a NULL pointer dereference may occur as shownbelow. [91222.095236][ T319] typec port0: failed to register partner (-17)... [91225.061491][ T319] Unable to handle kernel NULL pointer dereferenceat virtual address 000000000000039f [91225.274642][ T319] pc :tcpm_pd_data_request+0x310/0x13fc [91225.274646][ T319] lr :tcpm_pd_data_request+0x298/0x13fc [91225.308067][ T319] Call trace:[91225.308070][ T319] tcpm_pd_data_request+0x310/0x13fc [91225.308073][T319] tcpm_pd_rx_handler+0x100/0x9e8 [91225.355900][ T319]kthread_worker_fn+0x178/0x58c [91225.355902][ T319] kthread+0x150/0x200[91225.355905][ T319] ret_from_fork+0x10/0x30 Add a check for port->partnerto avoid dereferencing a NULL pointer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52877` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.6.0-14-generic - 6.6.0-14.14
linux-image-unsigned-6.6.0-14-generic - 6.6.0-14.14
linux-image-unsigned-6.6.0-14-generic-64k - 6.6.0-14.14
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.6.0-1001-aws - 6.6.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.6.0-1001-azure - 6.6.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.6.0-1001-gcp - 6.6.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1001-ibm - 6.8.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.6.0-14-lowlatency - 6.6.0-14.14.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.6.0-14-lowlatency-64k - 6.6.0-14.14.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.6.0-1001-oracle - 6.6.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-6.7.0-1001-raspi - 6.7.0-1001.1
No subscription required

No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required
